message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget to stick to.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is unfortunately too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500? This is still a good deal for you, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit. Let me know what you think.
I'm getting close, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I really want to make this deal happen, but I need to stay within my budget.
